:KitKat::

She looked up and found herself fully healed.  She opened the door to 
the chamber and stepped out.  She had her head lowered and felt like 
crying.  She knew she would feel bad for killing Land Mine, but she 
never imagined the internal torture she would have to endure.  In her 
mind, she kept replaying the event over and over.  Wishing she could 
correct or undo what has been done.  She didn't even look up to see 
who was around her.  Without a word, she went to her room and sat on 
the edge of the bed. She closed her eyes and whispered,"Will you ever 
forgive me Land Mine?  Will you ever give me peace?"  She made no 
sound.  She only let the tears roll down her cheeks.
